feedback.overall_comment: Excellent work! Your program correctly implements all aspects of the task, from reading user input and choosing appropriate data types to accurately calculating and displaying the acceleration. The output matches the sample run precisely.
strengths: Correct implementation of user input using Scanner.
Appropriate use of double data types for velocities and time.
Accurate calculation of acceleration using the provided formula.
Clear and correctly formatted output matching the sample run.

feedback.overall_comment: Excellent implementation. It correctly reads input, uses doubles, computes acceleration with the specified formula, and prints the expected message. Code is concise and aligns with the sample run.
strengths: Correct use of Scanner to read three inputs in one prompt
Appropriate use of double for v0, v1, t, and result
Accurate calculation of acceleration using (v1 - v0) / t
Output message matches the required format
areas_for_improvement: Consider validating input (e.g., t != 0 to avoid division by zero)
Optionally close the Scanner (scanner.close()) to release resources
Optional: format the output to a fixed number of decimal places for readability
